content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the panevėžys district court the case involves the division of property between the plaintiff and the defendant the plaintiff is responsible for paying stamp duty professional fees and court fees while the defendant is responsible for paying stamp duty and professional fees the court is being asked to dissolve the marriage and divide the matrimonial property various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property are discussed the applicant is seeking compensation for nonpecuniary damage and the division of property the court is asked to establish the rights and residence of the minor children both parties present their arguments and evidence the court finds that both parties failed to fulfill their matrimonial obligations leading to the breakdown of the marriage the court addresses the division of immovable property and other assets considering the best interests of the children the court determines the value and ownership of various items and divides them between the parties the court orders the applicant to pay the defendant monetary compensation various costs and fees are also ordered to be paid by both parties

metadata.cost: 418.91 EUR (stamp duty) + 798.00 EUR (professional fees) + 15.60 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the plaintiff; 88.78 EUR (stamp duty) + 206.20 EUR (professional fees)
